mapper.insert: INSERT INTO discuss (stu_id, discuss_title, discuss_content) VALUES (#{stu.stuid},#{discussTitle}, #{discussContent})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(t.reply_discuss_id) FROM( SELECT rd.reply_discuss_id,COUNT(prd.reply_discuss_id) AS 'praise_count', COUNT(ard.reply_discuss_id) AS 'against_count' FROM discuss d LEFT JOIN reply_discuss rd ON d.discuss_id = rd.discuss_id LEFT JOIN praise_reply_discuss prd ON prd.reply_discuss_id = rd.reply_discuss_id LEFT JOIN against_reply_discuss ard ON ard.reply_discuss_id = rd.reply_discuss_id LEFT JOIN student s ON rd.stu_id = s.stu_id WHERE d.discuss_id = #{discussid} GROUP BY rd.reply_discuss_id) t

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT d.discuss_id,d.discuss_title,d.discuss_content,COUNT(rd.discuss_id) AS 'reportNum' FROM report_discuss rd INNER JOIN discuss d ON rd.discuss_id = d.discuss_id WHERE d.status = 1 GROUP BY rd.discuss_id )t ORDER BY t.reportNum DESC
